00025 #ifndef __DISPLAY_SYSTEM_H__
00026 #define __DISPLAY_SYSTEM_H__
00027 
00028 #include "osystem.h"
00029 #include "Observer.h"
00030 #include "Application.h"
00031 
00032 namespace omega
00033 {
00035 // Forward declarations
00036 class SystemManager;
00037 
00039 class OMEGA_API DisplaySystem: public DynamicObject
00040 {
00041 public:
00042         enum DisplaySystemType { Invalid, Equalizer, Glut };
00043 
00044 public:
00045         virtual ~DisplaySystem() {}
00046 
00047         // sets up the display system. Called before initalize.
00048         virtual void setup(Setting& setting) {}
00049 
00050         // initializes the display system
00051         virtual void initialize(SystemManager* sys) {}
00052 
00053         // Starts display system rendering. This call does not return until the current omegalib application sends an
00054         // exit request to the system manager.
00055         virtual void run() = 0;
00056 
00057         // Layer and view management.
00058         virtual void setLayer(const char* viewName, Layer::Enum layer) = 0;
00059         virtual Layer::Enum getLayer(const char* viewName) = 0;
00060 
00061         virtual Observer* getObserver(int observerId) { return NULL; }
00062         
00063         virtual void cleanup() {}
00064 
00065         virtual DisplaySystemType getId() { return Invalid; }
00066 
00067 protected:
00068         DisplaySystem() {}
00069 };
00070 
00071 }; // namespace omega
00072 
00073 #endif
